full_summary:
**Temporary Staff Accommodations – Boulder Creek Compound, Yoho National Park, BC**

**Bid Solicitation Number:** 5P420-22-0319/A
**Bid Closing Date: April 25, 2023**

**Bidder Information:**

To receive official bids, please submit your bids by email or fax as indicated in the solicitation document. Parks Canada currently does not accept bids via SAP Ariba. Ensure that your bid is submitted through the correct channels to be considered for evaluation.

Note that in-person or courier submissions will not be accepted. The only acceptable email address for responses to the bid solicitation is [soumissionsouest-bidswest@canada.ca](mailto:soumissionsouest-bidswest@canada.ca). Bids submitted directly to the Contracting Authority or to any other email address will not be accepted.

A maximum email file size of 15 megabytes is the size that Parks Canada is capable of receiving. Bidders are responsible for any errors attributed to transmission or receipt due to file size. It is recommended that bidders consider sending multiple emails if the total email size exceeds 15 megabytes.

**Contract Requirements:**

Parks Canada requires temporary accommodation facilities for staff at the Boulder Creek Compound in Yoho National Park, with a capacity for up to 24 people. The anticipated period is four months, with an additional four-month option period. The period of the contract will be from May 1, 2023 to April 30, 2024, with an option to extend for an additional four months.

**Bid Evaluation:**

Bids will be evaluated based on the lowest price.

**Additional Information:**

National Parks Regulations require that all work is performed in accordance with the ordinances, laws, rules, and regulations set out in the National Park Act. Bidders should consult the solicitation document and related addenda for further information. Late submissions will not be considered.

Parks Canada has taken every effort to provide equivalent documents in both official languages. If discrepancies are found, please notify the Contracting Authority.

**Contract Location:**

The contract location is Yoho National Park, BC, with the flexibility to extend services across Canada.

**Contact Information:**

For any technical and contractual inquiries, please contact:

Daniel Nguyen
daniel.nguyen@pc.gc.ca
(403) 836-2352
Phone: 1-866-246-6893
Email: [soumissionsouest-bidswest@canada.ca](mailto
